item.title: Allerts, notices and panels
item.description: This tutorial demonstrates, how to insert various alerts, colored boxes etc to highlight information on a page,

item.title: Action buttons
item.description: Tutorial demonstrates, how to insert action buttons (i.e. links to travis builds, “follow me” etc)

item.title: Labels and icons
item.description: Tutorial demonstrates, how to insert labels (like “new”, “updated”) to the text; place small glypicons.

item.title: Tabs embedded, accordions
item.description: A page with information structured in accordion-manner, or in tabs (e.g. installation instruction in tab “Windows” and tab “Linux”).
